sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Bring vegetable stock to a boil in a pot. 2. Add lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, and minced garlic. Simmer for 5 minutes. 3. Stir in sliced mushrooms and bird's eye chili. 4. Add peeled and deveined shrimp. Cook until shrimp turns pink. 5. Season with lime juice, fish sauce, and sugar. 6. Garnish with chopped cilantro and green onion. 7. Serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Shrimp (200g, peeled and deveined), Mush</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Tom Yum Soup</name> <nutrition>Calories: 300, Protein: 20g, Fat: 10g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Peel and devein shrimp. 2. Slice mushrooms. 3. Bruise and chop lemongrass.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f491d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
